verses.verse: A Song <WH7892> of degrees <WH4609>. Blessed <WH835> is every one that feareth <WH3373> the YY <WH3068>; that walketh <WH1980> <WH8802> in his ways <WH1870>.
For thou shalt eat <WH398> <WH8799> the labour <WH3018> of thine hands <WH3709>: happy <WH835> shalt thou be, and it shall be well <WH2896> with thee.

Thy wife <WH802> shall be as a fruitful <WH6509> <WH8802> vine <WH1612> by the sides <WH3411> of thine house <WH1004>: thy children <WH1121> like olive <WH2132> plants <WH8363> round about <WH5439> thy table <WH7979>.
Behold, that thus shall the man <WH1397> be blessed <WH1288> <WH8792> that feareth <WH3373> the YY <WH3068>.
The YY <WH3068> shall bless <WH1288> <WH8762> thee out of TZiyon <WH6726>: and thou shalt see <WH7200> <WH8798> the good <WH2898> of Yerushalayim <WH3389> all the days <WH3117> of thy life <WH2416>.
Yea, thou shalt see <WH7200> <WH8798> thy children's <WH1121> children <WH1121>, and peace <WH7965> upon Yisra'EL <WH3478>.
